title: Don’t Hide From Market Volatility In Associated British Foods plc Or Persimmon plc & Other Housebuilders
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Wed, Sep 9, 2015, 14:05 BST - UK Markets close in 2 hrs 25 mins Don’t Hide From Market Volatility In Associated British Foods plc Or Persimmon plc & Other Housebuilders By Nathan Parmelee | Fool.co.uk – 10 minutes ago 2,111.00 +28.0000 
In this investing video, Champion Shares PRO portfolio manager Nathan Parmelee discusses the recent market volatility and he thinks investing in pricey, domestically focused companies to avoid market volatility won't lead to market-beating returns. 
To find out the strategies to adopt if you want to become one of the growing number of surprise UK millionaires , read this FREE Motley Fool report: ' 7 Simple Steps For Seeking Serious Wealth ' while it remains available! 

Nathan Parmelee has no position in any shares mentioned. The Motley Fool UK has no position in any of the shares mentioned.
